text: Gridcoin (ticker: GRC) is an open source cryptocurrency which securely rewards volunteer computing performed on the BOINC, a distributed computing platform that is home to over 30 science projects spanning a range of scientific disciplines. Gridcoin attempts to address and ease the environmental energy impact of cryptocurrency mining through its proof-of-research and proof-of- stake protocols, as compared to the proof of work system used by Bitcoin (although it fails to explicitly address the energy cost of computing power). ==References== ==External links== * Official Gridcoin website Category:Cryptocurrencies Category:Grid computing projects
title: Gridcoin
